content: It is essentially a logic puzzle, but the tricky part is realizing that the puzzle is your self-image. Our whole lives we constantly think and worry about ourselves, our pasts, and our future, yet when we trying to figure out what exactly "Me" is it seems impossible to pin down. This is the whole point of self-inquiry because the realization caused the entire puzzle to dissolve, but it's not because you finally find the missing piece, but understand what exactly it is you are trying to solve does not have the solution you always thought it did.
